Yggdrasil: Spy on her first. In the Iron Squad, we use a special
"mole" device that slowly analyzes a bot. If you manage to snipe it on
her, she'll be tagged and we'll know anything we want to.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus Prime: How are we supposed to do that? If we wait to capture
Nightlight we may not be able to make the clone fast enough to replace
her without the Preds knowing.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Yggdrasil did a quick check of the
data he had "captured" and nodded
> with a surprised expression.
> 
> Yggdrasil: Oh yes, yes! That's even more than enough! It's as like the
> consciousness of Nightlight's program is willing to work with us...
> But for more credibility, I think we'll have to look at the First
> Nightlight so we know how to make this clone and how she'll have to
> behave under her Pred disguise.
> 
> 
> 
> Rodimus Prime : : The Maximal Commander came back online from sleep
> mode. Yggdrasil's computer had gotton all of Nightlight's programming
> from his spark. Rodimus Prime: Will that do, Yggdrasil? 
> 
> 
>
